sentences.cn: …一部关于无家可归现象的电视记录片。

sentences.en: A documentary draft offers greater security to the exporter.
sentences.cn: 跟单汇票对出口商来说更为保险.

sentences.en: A short documentary prefaced the feature movie.
sentences.cn: 故事片开始前放映了一部短纪录片.

sentences.en: He drew on his experience as a yachtsman to make a documentary programme.
sentences.cn: 他凭借曾经做过快艇驾驶员的经验制作了一档纪实节目。

sentences.en: He equips the story with a map, and adds documentary chapters.
sentences.cn: 他在那部小说里插印了一幅地图, 还加了一些文件式的篇章.

sentences.en: I had no thoughts of making a dramatic film. I was working in documentary.
sentences.cn: 我没想过要拍一部剧情片，我正在拍一部纪录片。

sentences.en: I watched a documentary on the Civil War.
sentences.cn: 我看了一部关于内战的纪录片.

sentences.en: It took them six weeks to film the documentary.
sentences.cn: 他们拍摄这部纪录片用了六个星期。

sentences.en: One of the most useful sources of documentary evidence is maps.
sentences.cn: 最有价值的文献证据之一就是地图。

sentences.en: She also narrated a documentary about the Kirov Ballet School.
sentences.cn: 她还为一部关于基洛夫芭蕾舞学院的纪录片作过解说。

sentences.en: She was able to shoot the rumour down in flames with ample documentary evidence.
sentences.cn: 她能够用充分的书面证据将传闻彻底粉碎。

sentences.en: The documentary lasts for more than two-and-a-half hours, and there is scarcely a dull minute.
sentences.cn: 该纪录片片长超过两个半小时，却鲜有沉闷之处。

sentences.en: The documentary left me in a state of shock.
sentences.cn: 那部纪录片使我大为震惊。

sentences.en: The documentary opens tomorrow in movie theaters nationwide.
sentences.cn: 这部纪录片明日起在全国各地的影院上映。

sentences.en: The documentary premiered at the Jerusalem Film Festival.
sentences.cn: 这部纪录片在耶路撒冷电影节首映。

sentences.en: This great battle was vividly recorded in the documentary film.
sentences.cn: 这部记录片生动地再现了这场伟大的战役.

words.tran_cn: 文件，公文；[计] 文档；证件

phrases.tran_cn: 跟单信用证；跟单信用状

trans.tran_en: giving a record of or report on the facts about sth, especially by using pictures, recordings, etc. of people involved
a film or television or a radio programme that gives detailed information about a particular subject
